description: This module wraps RAST using the KBase SDK. Most of the functional aspects can be found in the genome_annotation repo. https://github.com/kbase/genome_annotation. This module includes reference data that is pulled from RAST FTP servers.
name: kbaseapps/RAST_SDK
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
